documents.title: AI Infrastructure Spend Pulse
documents.snippet: Market Intel — Q1 FY26: Enterprise GPU procurement is up 38% QoQ, with AMD MI300 deployments finally breaking into 22% of new clusters. Hyperscalers are bundling inference credits with colo contracts to block Azure Arc wins.

documents.title: Retail Agent Benchmark
documents.snippet: Market Intel — Retail CX: Top 50 retailers report a 14% decrease in live-chat handle time after layering retrieval-augmented agents onto legacy IVRs. Leaders pair in-store apps with the same grounding graph.
